Kindedo opened its doors in 1990 with a unique vision to provide its students
with a globally focused study of arts.

accordion.title: What is the best age to start Kindergarten?
accordion.description: Some states and countries implement mandatory early childhood education. With such rules, many preschool and kindergarten learning centers are built.
